NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
October 27, 1958
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
To: Bill Harley, Region III
Richard Vogl, Region IV
Bob Schenkkan, Region V
From: Harry J. Skomia
Have discussed with President Schooley how most equitably to help
support regional meetings requested. The decision we’ve come up
with is to tell each of you three that you can each count on not over
$400.00 for a regional meeting before June 3 0.
If and when you get dates set and plan to send out announcements
please correspond with Harold Hill on the way in which reimburse¬
ments and/or expenses (for which we are to pay) will need to be
handled. Since all travel (if any) which is reimbursed has to be tax
exempt, since this all goes through on University of Illinois vouchers,
etc, We want to be sure none of you gets stuck or frustrated later on.
HJS:jg
CC: F. E. Schooley
H.E. Hill
